uk.co.strangeskies.reflection

Class IntersectionTypes

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.strangeskies.reflection.IntersectionTypes

  • @ProviderType
public class IntersectionTypes
extends Object
    A collection of utility methods relating to intersection types.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Type intersectionOf(Collection<? extends Type> types) 
      static Type intersectionOf(Collection<? extends Type> types, BoundSet bounds)
      Create an intersection type from the given types, with leniency towards validation of intersections between types which may contain inference variables according to the given bound set.
      static Type intersectionOf(Type... types) 
      static IntersectionType proxy(Supplier<IntersectionType> source) 
      static String toString(IntersectionType type, Imports imports)
      Give a canonical String representation of an intersection type which supports infinite types.

      Give a canonical String representation of an intersection type which supports infinite types.

    • Method Detail

      • proxy

        public static IntersectionType proxy(Supplier<IntersectionType> source)
        Parameters:
        source - A supplier of the intersection type we wish to proxy.
        Returns:
        A proxy for an intersection type, forwarding to the instance provided by the given supplier at the moment of each invocation. This is generally useful for algorithms which deal with infinite types.

      • intersectionOf

        public static Type intersectionOf(Type... types)
        Parameters:
        types - The set of types from which to derive a new intersection type.
        Returns:
        An intersection type containing each of the given types, or a single type, if they can all be represented as such.

      • intersectionOf

        public static Type intersectionOf(Collection<? extends Type> types)
        Parameters:
        types - The set of types from which to derive a new intersection type.
        Returns:
        An intersection type containing each of the given types, or a single type, if they can all be represented as such.

      • intersectionOf

        public static Type intersectionOf(Collection<? extends Type> types,
                                  BoundSet bounds)
        Create an intersection type from the given types, with leniency towards validation of intersections between types which may contain inference variables according to the given bound set.
        Parameters:
        types - The set of types from which to derive a new intersection type.
        bounds - The bound set which provides context for any inference variables which may be mentioned by the given types.
        Returns:
        An intersection type containing each of the given types, or a single type, if they can all be represented as such.

      • toString

        public static String toString(IntersectionType type,
                              Imports imports)
        Give a canonical String representation of an intersection type which supports infinite types. Provided class and package imports allow the names of some classes to be output without full package qualification.
        Parameters:
        type - the type to print
        imports - classes and packages for which full package qualification may be omitted from output
        Returns:
        a canonical string representation of the given type

      • toString

        public static String toString(IntersectionType type,
                              Imports imports,
                              Isomorphism isomorphism)
        Give a canonical String representation of an intersection type which supports infinite types. Provided class and package imports allow the names of some classes to be output without full package qualification.
        Parameters:
        type - the type to print
        imports - classes and packages for which full package qualification may be omitted from output
        isomorphism - a type to string isomorphic mapping to deal with recursion
        Returns:
        a canonical string representation of the given type
